name: BloomDesk
overview:
BloomDesk is the first collective intelligence workplace dedicated to the corporate real estate professionals. It connects users to the knowledge, experts, insights and best practice they need in order to solve their challenges.

How? BloomDesk brings the ability to deepen stakeholder relationships, increase workforce effectiveness, and drive service innovation. It will also create a central repository of knowledge & people. BloomDesk works as a “Trans-Functional Stimulus” to allow people to deliver the best of their values to a clear target. BloomDesk allows strategic milestones Development Reporting and Monitoring. And last but not least, it supports to decision-makers follow-up on Risk-Management and Compliance.

BloomDesk has started to invite some triple A real-esate experts to be represented on the platform. We have thus already welcomed experts in asset management, architecture, communication & marketing, leasing & selling, lighting design, amongst others.

Our ambition With BloomDesk we want to transcend the way real-estate professionals manage their projects and offer them the opportunity to create more value by accessing the best expertize on the market. Property Development processes associated with the commitment of a wider range of values besides Financial or Consumption ones such as Community, Environment, Welfare, all in a transparent and collaborative process, are require to build or re-build the Property assets sustainability.

BloomDesk is: • A collective intelligence platform • A process management tool: it will organize, execute and monitor your challenges and flow knowledge to the people who need it. • A project data room

While we offer corporate solutions, we are also looking to welcome non-profit organization to create an open-source access to expertize that can thus offer the power of crowd sourcing to resolve tough sustainable and real-estate challenges the world faces.
